visit_help_center.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.
visit_help_center.message: You may want to [[visit our Help Center]] for more troubleshooting options.

vpn_coming_soon.description: Text of the tooltip of the rate us button CTA in the Options page.
vpn_coming_soon.message: Check out what's coming soon from AdBlock

want_stop_seeing.description: GFC messaging on the popup menu

want_to_remove.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.
want_to_remove.message: Do you want to remove it?

warning.description: Warns the user about an error.

warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a allowlist filter for all websites with only some exceptions.
warning_overrules_filters.message:
Warning: on all other sites you will see ads!
This overrules all other filters for those sites.

watermelon_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

website_broken.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

website_still_broken.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. This section contains links to the AdBlock source code and contributors. In this context, 'tick' can be replaced with the word 'work'.
whatmakesadblocktick.message: Want to see what makes AdBlock tick?

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

whatsnew.description: Link to display the changelog on the Support tab
whatsnew.message: See the latest updates in our [[changelog]]

where_to_enable_dc.message: If you change your mind you can enable additional Distraction Control features [[here]].

which_distractions.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

whitelist_youtube_channel_v2.description: Menu entry to whitelist the channel of the current YouTube video or page. The channel name will appear on a line below this menu item.

whitelisted_a_site.description: Part 1 of a call-to-action on the allowlist wizard
whitelisted_a_site.message: You just added a site to your allowlist!

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the allowlist wizard (Don't run on this page/pages on this domain)

wizard_premium_cta_part_I.description: Part of a message on the blocklist wizard
wizard_premium_cta_part_I.message: You just blocked something on this site.

wizard_premium_cta_part_II.description: Part of a message on the blocklist wizard
wizard_premium_cta_part_II.message: Apply this preference to all of your devices and ensure you never lose your AdBlock settings with Backup & Sync.

wizard_premium_cta_title.description: Part of a message on the blocklist wizard
wizard_premium_cta_title.message: Hey, looks like you might like AdBlock Premium

wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Alert shown when the user tries to use a blocklist/allowlist wizard on an old website
wizardcantrunonframesets.message: This AdBlock feature does not work on this site because it uses out of date technology. You can allow or block ads manually in the 'Customize' tab of the options page.

wont_change_anything.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.
wont_change_anything.message: We won't change anything so you'll continue to see the ad.

wont_show_again.description: Message shown when user opts out of call-to-action
wont_show_again.message: OK, we won't show you this message again.

work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.
work_around_hulu_problems.message: Work around Hulu.com videos not playing (requires restarting your browser)

yes.description: A positive response to a question

you_can_slide_to_change.description: allowlist slider usage instructions. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.
you_can_slide_to_change.message: You can slide below to change exactly what pages AdBlock won't run on.

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: The more filter lists you use, the slower AdBlock runs. Using too many lists can even crash your browser on some websites. Press OK to subscribe to this list anyway.

youtube_manage_subscribed.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
youtube_manage_subscribed.message: Manage AdBlock settings from my YouTube subscriptions page

youtube_onpage_icon_allow_all_btn_text.description: The button text on the YouTube on page icon; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels

youtube_onpage_icon_allowed_complete_tex.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels
youtube_onpage_icon_allowed_complete_tex.message: Ads allowed on all subscribed channels

youtube_onpage_icon_allowing_ads_on_chan.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels

youtube_onpage_icon_block_all_btn_text.description: The button text on the YouTube on page icon; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels

youtube_onpage_icon_blocked_complete_tex.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels
youtube_onpage_icon_blocked_complete_tex.message: Ads blocked on all subscribed channels

youtube_onpage_icon_blocking_ads_on_chan.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels

youtube_onpage_icon_msg.description: The message text on the YouTube on page icon; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels
youtube_onpage_icon_msg.message: Manage ads on your subscribed channels:

youtube_onpage_icon_no_channels_text.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels
youtube_onpage_icon_no_channels_text.message: Subscribe to at least one YouTube channel to manage ads on your subscribed channels.

youtube_onpage_icon_one_moment_text.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels

youtube_onpage_icon_sign_in_text.description: The message text on the YouTube on page panel; shown on https://www.youtube.com/feed/channels
youtube_onpage_icon_sign_in_text.message: Sign in to your YouTube account to manage ads on your subscribed channels.

youve_blocked_num_ads.description: Text of a menu item in the popup menu asking users to leave us a review. The $numBlocked$ will be replaced with the number of ads the users has blocked, starting at 10,000.

ytadblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
